item.title: Restore Whatsapp Chats from Local Backup on De-Googled Android - Guide
item.description: Authored by AH License Notice This article is published under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) license. Table of Contents Introduction 0. Pre-preparation Reading 1. Create a WhatsApp Chat Backup 2. Save the WhatsApp Backup files to Downloads folder 3. Uninstall WhatsApp from the phone 4. Install WhatsApp onto the phone x. Transfer WhatsApp backup files to external storage from the phone x. Transfer WhatsApp backup files from external storage to the device 5.
